about_the_game:
A "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS" Day commemorative set of 25 CG portraits from "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS VIII" that can be used in the Editor, along with 2 new scenarios, "Lady Power" and "Those Loyal to the Han."

Two new scenarios
- Lady Power
- Those Loyal to the Han

Additional CG portraits
- CG portraits of 25 officers, including Zhuge Liang, Lu Bu, and Diaochan, from the original version of this game, "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS VIII."

How to access:
- New scenarios
Access New Game and then Scenarios, where you can select "Lady Power" or "Those Loyal to the Han" to begin playing.
- CG portraits
Set officers' CG portraits via Edit Original Officers or Edit Historical Officers.
To view the portraits, access Edit, Edit Original Officers, Create Original Officers or Change Original Officers, and then Portrait. Alternatively, access Edit, Edit Historical Officers, Edit Historical Officers again, Portrait, and then the "Special" tab.
